title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Micro-Financing the Grassroots Sector (EP 60023) Salient features of micro finance, benefits and target groups, Understand the scope and potential of micro-finance, Active micro-finance by potential organizations, Micro-finance models and characteristics, designing micro-finance program- client identification, Credit Institutions-rural credit, Types of rural institutions, self Help Groups (SHGs) and generation of savings
